post.body: lol I wish. I don't know what to do. I don't know how bad 94 is gonna be, especially coming back at almost 3am
Hey hey hey......easy buddy! We're here to help......calm down lol
Your "epic" hot cocoa sounds real good right about now lol
I'm gonna go for the "move it once" approach cause its too early and too cold out to do it now
Good morning! Yeah its pretty nasty out, I think I'll wait til it stops to even begin moving that stuff
Classic! :)
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa LOL.....I can't believe you still remember that! lol
LOL!!! Yes it has been a minute! Like I said before I kinda miss my Ypsilanti days :(
Things are pretty good on this side. I hope my snow blower works in the morning...haven't started it up this year yet
You got about 3 more hours before that starts
You should do it. Hell, I go to the movies by myself all the time. I just took myself out to Chilli's too. Solo is so relaxing!
*calmly erases J's number* yeah I feel you lol
lol ah the sneaky ones lol
lol wow...what a battle. Stacey Augmon vs. The back of Forrest Whitakers neck
Your son got great taste cause Keisha Cole is killin em!!!
Her moms be trippin for real
Well you may have to have someone get it and put it on a disc for you. That software works good
Also before u start running your spyware remover pull your net cord out of the computer so the spyware can't comm with outside
Try and get Kaspersky Internet Security......it works good
Zshare huh?
Thinkin I might get up the nerve to call Somaya Reece tonight LOL
Original copies of MOTU goin for $13.20 on Amazon.com
Damn thats some classic Sub material right there. My copies of Masters of the Universe and Waterworldwide never leave the house
I shoulda asked her if she had twitter. As Royce would say "She was the shit foo!"
A bunch of crazy cold weather is whats goin on in the D. It's 28 degrees outside right now man!!!!
Ahhhh...I wanna go to the A-Side Holiday joint, but I don't want to slide all the way down I-94 to get there. What to do?????????
Damn its not lookin good for me gettin out tonight.......arrrrghhhhhh
I hope the roads/freeways are okay by 9ish so I can go to the A-Side Holiday Party.....mother nature please have a heart
Ah and Comcast recovers! I can read Hater Central now :) Probably should go do my snow first though :(
Mother nature gave Comcast a tiger uppercut so no cable or internet. Blast!
The wise man that knows the snow is coming buys DiGiorno pizza the night before. I am that wise man lol
IT'S A STUPID AMOUNT OF SNOW OUTSIDE! Crazy part is its supposed to snow until 4pm. WOWSERS!
Listening to Pink Lava Lamp to see what the big deal is about Charles Hamilton. It's ok so far....not mind blowing though
Guess its time to stop hiding at Chilli's and go home and face my MPC.....gonna try again
Oh my damn Keisha Cole got a bad body! What's up with this chick Frankie though?! WTF
BLAST THESE DAMN COHO BOTS!!!!
I really need to stop listening to this New Edition cd for the day....this album was the ish tho!
Wow..just got home from Chilli's. I may have to call corporate and tell them how much I enjoyed my dining experience. Shouts to my waitress
My waitress is the shit!!! I think she gave me more stuff for free than I actually paid for! She will get a nice tip
Ahh Chilli's....and I got my favorite waitress. YES!
